article_title: How the dead are counted in Gaza.
sentence: How  the  dead  are  counted  in  Gaza.

article_title: How the dead are counted in Gaza.
sentence: The  chaotic  situation  in  the  territory  makes  getting  accurate  information  on  the  numbers  of  people  who  have  died  extremely  demanding.

article_title: How the dead are counted in Gaza.
sentence: The  last  death  roll  reported  on  Monday  evening  said  11,240  people  had  been  killed,  including  4,630  children  ,  since  the  Hamas  attacks  on  Israel  on  7  October.

article_title: How the dead are counted in Gaza.
sentence: Health  ministry  officials  say  the  death  figures  are  recorded  by  medical  professionals  before  being  passed  on  to  them  and  the  figures  only  include  people  recorded  dead  in  hospital.

article_title: How the dead are counted in Gaza.
sentence: And,  because  they  do  not  take  into  account  those  who  died  at  the  scene  of  blasts  whose  bodies  have  not  been  found,  or  buried  immediately,  they  may  be  an  undercount,  Gazan  officials  say.
